title: Glovee - CRM for Immigration Consultants
description: It is a web-based application that helps consultants to manage their clients, cases, and documents.

title: Telco Customer Churn Analysis
description: Telco Customer Churn — interactive Tableau dashboard and analysis.

title: US Debt Tracker
description: It is an Excel-based data analysis project created to explore and visualize trends in the United States’ public and governmental debt.

title: Marketing Analysis
description: This project analyzes retail customer data to uncover trends in demographics, country distribution, and sentiment versus product ratings. It also examines website interactions to improve the online shopping experience and support targeted marketing
